archimate:BusinessObject.name: Job Step Procedure
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
A Job Step Procedure, as part of a Work Master, is the order which process steps are carried out as part of a Job to make a Batch of Product. It is the template for a Job Step. The Job Step Procedure is equivalent to other Object types in ISA95 - Personnel, Material, Equipment, Physical Asset.
This definition is consistent with https://reference.opcfoundation.org/ISA95JOBCONTROL/v200/docs/4.1.
